item.title: About Digital Gardens
item.description: I love gardening, and I love electrons. Here you will find a combination of both. This is my space to put ideas out “into the void” while also allowing those ideas to grow.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! I’m Laura. This is my personal wiki, in the style of a dynamic digital garden ðŸª´ using Quartz Jekyll and Obsidian.

item.title: ADS-B Resources
item.description: Some nice resources I’ve found in my searches. dump1090 #dump1090 #rtlsdr #adsb #python https://github.com/antirez/dump1090 ![[Running dump1090.bat.png]] Uses rtlsdr.dll, decodes messages into View1090.

item.title: LabVIEW RTL-SDR Resources
item.description: #rtlsdr #LabVIEW #adsb Look up Albert Lederer’s RTL-SDR Examples on NI.com Illuminated-G RTL-SDR Repository

item.title: Python Virtual Environment
item.description: #python #venv #powershell Use powershell cd to the directory to make the venv in OR create new directory for it python -m venv env

item.title: Setting up RTL-SDR
item.description: #rtlsdr #adsb #sdr RTL-SDR Setup Download sdr# install-rtlsdr.bat from sdrsharp zip plug in RTL-SDR dongle run zadig.exe select Interface0 ( may need to go to Options-> List All Devices) run SDRSharp.
